name: Love Potion #1
description: Love Potion #1 is a 70% sativa strain bred by Reeferman Seeds. G13 was crossed with a Santa Marta Colombian Gold, and crossed with the Colombian Gold again to achieve this skunky, lemon-flavored sativa hybrid.
attributes_title: Happy, Euphoric, Aroused, Focused, Uplifted, Stress, Pain, Depression, Nausea, Fatigue, Dry Mouth, Anxious, Paranoid, Headache, Dry Eyes
